segments.text: hi , Andy , how are you finding your new job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: pretty good . My colleagues seem alright . So far everything is great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's nice . What do they have you doing over there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , I work in the marketing department . The corporate culture is totally different from my last employer . Before , when I was assigned a task , I was totally on my own but here most of the work is don
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that ' s really good . It's very important to feel like you are part of the team at work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: indeed . Team work is highly valued in this new company . I like our boss too . He is easy to get along with treats everybody with respect and appreciation . He's highly respected by all his employees .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's great , that's good for a positive work environment and helps motivate employees . I wish my boss was like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: true , take my former supervisor as an example . He was extremely controlling and overbearing . He always had to micromanage everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , now you don't have to worry about that . This new place sounds really good .
